name: FULLY AUTOMATED LUXURY GAY SPACE COMMUNISM
name_original: FULLY AUTOMATED LUXURY GAY SPACE COMMUNISM
description:
• The year: 2035
  • Your mission: to spread FULLY AUTOMATED LUXURY GAY SPACE COMMUNISM!
  • Is this awesome: of course it is
  • Do you think that's a realistic timeline for space travel: not with that attitude, buddy

Space thrusts, the cursor orients you, and the left mouse button fires.  Press 'a' to drop pamphlets!  If you're on mobile, taps will start the game , orient you, move, and fire.   Good luck, captain!
